channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Supreme Court lets California use its new, Democratic-friendly congressional map
item.description: The Supreme Court has cleared the way for California to use its new congressional map for this year's midterm election. Voters approved it as a Democr...

item.title: Is the U.S. heading into a dictatorship?
item.description: The Atlantic writer Robert Kagan says as Trump violates norms, laws and the Constitution, including his call to nationalize elections, "we're on the e...

item.title: Reporter's notebook: A peek inside the Olympic Village
item.description: NPR reporters visited the Milan Olympic Village in the days before the opening ceremony to investigate the dining hall dessert situation and other pre...

item.title: Moltbook is the newest social media platform — but it's just for AI bots
item.description: A new message board for artificial intelligence agents has prompted some strange conversations, and existential questions about the inner lives of bot...

item.title: Newly released court records reveal misconduct inquiry into federal judge
item.description: A federal judge said he retired to speak out about threats to the rule of law. Newly released court orders suggest his exit coincided with a misconduc...

item.title: Nancy Guthrie disappeared from an Arizona neighborhood that is dark at night, quiet and spread out
How plans for Trump International hotel in Belgrade unravelled
item.description: The project would have built on the ruins of the defence ministry bombed by Nato back in 1999.

item.title: No suspect identified in disappearance of Savannah Guthrie's mom
item.description: The disappearance of "Today" show co-host Savannah Guthrie's mother, Nancy Guthrie, is being investigated as a crime.

item.title: Trump’s border czar is pulling 700 immigration officers out of Minnesota immediately
item.description: President Donald Trump’s border czar says he is reducing the number of immigration enforcement officers in Minnesota after state and local officials a...

item.title: Church fresco resembling Italian PM has face scrubbed out
item.description: The artist who painted the cherub has admitted it was Giorgia Meloni's face, as the Rome church sees a steady flow of curious visitors.

item.title: Border czar Homan says feds will withdraw 700 law enforcement personnel
item.description: Since federal immigration agents fatally shot a man in Minnesota, the state's top corrections official told CBS News there have been "conversations" w...

item.title: Trump says the lesson from Minneapolis is to use a "softer touch" in immigration enforcement
item.description: President Trump told NBC News the call to remove 700 immigration officers from Minneapolis came from him.

item.title: Trump says America should move on from Epstein - it may not be that easy
item.description: The justice department says its review of the files is over, but the story is again proving to have a life of its own.

item.title: Man who tried to shoot Trump at a Florida golf course gets life in prison
Fears of new arms race as US-Russia nuclear weapons treaty due to expire
item.description: The New Start treaty has limited the number of deployed strategic nuclear warheads for both countries.

item.title: Fearing Russia will seize her town, war widow moves husband's grave to Kyiv
item.description: Russia's gains on the battlefield have forced Natalia to rebury her husband in Kyiv.

item.title: EEOC investigating Nike over alleged discrimination against White workers
item.description: The U.S. Equal Employment Opportunity Commission said Nike may have engaged in "a pattern or practice of disparate treatment against White employees."

item.title: With latest Minnesota fraud case looming, lead prosecutors have quit
item.description: The four prosecutors who spearheaded a $250 million Minnesota fraud case have all left the U.S. Attorney's Office in a growing wave of resignations.
